extension.description: ‘Events and Awards’: Tools to support the full life cycle of a major District 5 or Squadron meeting. Termed an ‘Event’, it can be a conference, governing board, executive committee meeting, training class, change of watch, or rendezvous. To be considered an ‘Event’ there must be a defined start date and time, end date and time, and a designated member responsible for meeting organization and agenda.

field.name: siteLog
field.label: Activate Logging
field.description: Set to True to activate logging in module routines.

field.name: siteDump
field.label: Activate JDump
field.description: Set to True to activate calling the extension 'JDump' routines.

field.name: dbsource
field.label: Database Source
field.description: Choose a local or remote database.

field.name: ipaddr
field.label: Database System IP Address
field.description: Specify the IP address of the source database. That system must be configured to accept MySql statements from this host.

fieldset.name: orgsre
fieldset.label: Module Function
fieldset.description: Identifies the purpose of the module. Maintenance allows generation of a customized form to enter new or modify existing entries. Display allows selection of specific types of events for display to the public. Both types work in cooperation with the 'Alternative Layout' control in the Advanced tab.

field.name: modtype
field.label: Type of display
field.description: Maintenance or Display. Determines the type database searches needed.
field.option: Event Maintenance. Officers Only. Can call the form to update an event.
Event List. Use the Advanced Tab's 'Alternative Layout' field to specify the format of the list.
Award Maintenance. Officers Only. Can call the form to update an award.
Award List. Use the Advanced Tab's 'Alternative Layout' field to specify the format of the list.
History Maintenance. Officers only. Allows user to enter or update a Hostorical Object.

field.name: orgType
field.label: Organizaton Type
field.description: Squadron or District and how the identity is determined.

field.name: display_alias
field.label: Display Menu Item Alias.
field.description: Identifies the Menu Item that will be called from an item in the list. Field is needed when the 'Type of display(modtype)' field is set to an Event or Award List. Field should contain the menu-item alias of the desired Menu Item! It will become an element in the generated url.

field.name: scope
field.label: Limits on items returned.
field.description: Establishes a limit on the items listed. Typically set to 'future' for event maintenance. 'All' will return everything.
field.option: Only Future Events, Awards or Objects

field.name: type
field.label: Event Type
field.description: Select the event types to be displayed.

field.name: layout_height
field.label: Specifies the pixel height of the events list. As an example - 400px
field.description: Provide the number of pixels for the height of the heml block.
